tr_quotes.quote: Bilgi gerçeklerin birikimidir, oysa bilgelik neyin önemli ve önemli olmadığını ayırt edebilme becerisidir.
tr_quotes.author: John Izzo

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgelik, insanlık ve cesaret; üç evrensel değer.
tr_quotes.author: Konfüçyüs

tr_quotes.quote: Kıymet bilmek ne büyük bir bilgelik.
tr_quotes.author: Sedat Balun

tr_quotes.quote: Bilge kişi bilgeliği arar, akılsız kişi onu bulduğunu düşünür.
tr_quotes.author: İran arasözleri

tr_quotes.quote: Büyüklük sadedir. Basittir. Şunu anlayın: Sadece aritmetiğin dört kuralı değişmez ve kalıcıdır. Nihai bilgelik budur.
tr_quotes.author: Yevgeni İvanoviç Zamyatin

tr_quotes.quote: Biraz kendini unut, işığın bilgelik, sıcaklığın merhamet olduğunu bil.
tr_quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

tr_quotes.quote: Nezaketten daha büyük ne gibi bir bilgelik bulabilirsiniz?
tr_quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

tr_quotes.quote: Daha az sorun olmasını ummaktan vazgeçip daha fazla bilgelik istemeliyiz.
tr_quotes.author: Robin Sharma

en_quotes.quote: Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is God's gift, that's why we call it the present
en_quotes.author: Joan Rivers

en_quotes.quote: I have just three things to teach: simplicity, patience, compassion. These three are your greatest treasures
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: Talent is God-given; be humble. Fame is man-given; be thankful. Conceit is self-given; be careful
en_quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

en_quotes.quote: In every walk with nature one receives far more than he seeks
en_quotes.author: John Muir

en_quotes.quote: True knowledge exists in knowing that you know nothing
en_quotes.author: Socrates

en_quotes.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom, compassion, and courage are the three universally recognized moral qualities of men
en_quotes.author: Confucius

en_quotes.quote: Silence at the proper season is wisdom, and better than any speech
en_quotes.author: Plutarch

en_quotes.quote: O, what a tangled web we weave when first we practise to deceive!
en_quotes.author: Walter Scott

en_quotes.quote: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration
en_quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

en_quotes.quote: Talent is God given. Be humble. Fame is man-given. Be grateful. Conceit is self-given. Be careful
en_quotes.author: John Wooden

en_quotes.quote: Kindness is more important than wisdom, and the recognition of this is the beginning of wisdom
en_quotes.author: Theodore Isaac Rubin

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge is knowing that a tomato is a fruit. Wisdom is knowing not to put it in a fruit salad
en_quotes.author: Brian O'Driscoll

en_quotes.quote: Spectacular achievement is always preceded by unspectacular preparation
en_quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

en_quotes.quote: When in doubt, don't
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: He is no fool who gives what he cannot keep to gain what he cannot lose
en_quotes.author: Jim Elliot

en_quotes.quote: That old law about 'an eye for an eye' leaves everybody blind. The time is always right to do the right thing
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal
en_quotes.author: Henry Ford

en_quotes.quote: Don't gain the world and lose your soul; wisdom is better than silver or gold
en_quotes.author: Bob Marley

en_quotes.quote: As you walk down the fairway of life you must smell the roses, for you only get to play one round
en_quotes.author: Ben Hogan

en_quotes.quote: All things must come to the soul from its roots, from where it is planted
en_quotes.author: Saint Teresa of Avila

en_quotes.quote: None knows the weight of another's burden
en_quotes.author: George Herbert

en_quotes.quote: We are made wise not by the recollection of our past, but by the responsibility for our future
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: Make it your habit not to be critical about small things
en_quotes.author: Edward Everett Hale

en_quotes.quote: Habit, if not resisted, soon becomes necessity
en_quotes.author: Saint Augustine

en_quotes.quote: Never find fault with the absent
en_quotes.author: Alexander Pope

en_quotes.quote: Never tell people how to do things. Tell them what to do and they will surprise you with their ingenuity
en_quotes.author: George S. Patton

en_quotes.quote: It's the little details that are vital. Little things make big things happen
en_quotes.author: John Wooden

en_quotes.quote: The way you see people is the way you treat them, and the way you treat them is what they become
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: Where there is charity and wisdom, there is neither fear nor ignorance
en_quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

en_quotes.quote: Nature and books belong to the eyes that see them
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: You've got to go out on a limb sometimes because that's where the fruit is
en_quotes.author: Will Rogers

en_quotes.quote: He who lives in harmony with himself lives in harmony with the universe
en_quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

en_quotes.quote: Step with care and great tact, and remember that Life's a Great Balancing Act
en_quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

en_quotes.quote: If you don't know where you are going, any road will get you there
en_quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

en_quotes.quote: Leave no stone unturned
en_quotes.author: Euripides

en_quotes.quote: The day of fortune is like a harvest day, We must be busy when the corn is ripe
en_quotes.author: Torquato Tasso

en_quotes.quote: To advise is not to compel
en_quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

en_quotes.quote: A good head and a good heart are always a formidable combination
en_quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

en_quotes.quote: Knowing others is wisdom, knowing yourself is Enlightenment
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: People don't notice whether it's winter or summer when they're happy
en_quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

en_quotes.quote: A long habit of not thinking a thing wrong gives it a superficial appearance of being right
en_quotes.author: Thomas Paine

en_quotes.quote: Wise kings generally have wise counselors; and he must be a wise man himself who is capable of distinguishing one
en_quotes.author: Diogenes

en_quotes.quote: There are many ways of going forward, but only one way of standing still
en_quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom begins in wonder
en_quotes.author: Socrates

en_quotes.quote: Be as you wish to seem
en_quotes.author: Socrates

en_quotes.quote: The truest wisdom is a resolute determination
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: Blessed are those who give without remembering and take without forgetting
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Bibesco

en_quotes.quote: Wise men make more opportunities than they find
en_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: The opportunity for brotherhood presents itself every time you meet a human being
en_quotes.author: Jane Wyman

en_quotes.quote: If you only have a hammer, you tend to see every problem as a nail
en_quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom oft times consists of knowing what to do next
en_quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

en_quotes.quote: It has long been an axiom of mine that the little things are infinitely the most important
en_quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

en_quotes.quote: The greater our knowledge increases the more our ignorance unfolds
en_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Give me a lever long enough and a fulcrum on which to place it, and I shall move the world
en_quotes.author: Archimedes

en_quotes.quote: It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters
en_quotes.author: Epictetus

en_quotes.quote: They must often change, who would be constant in happiness or wisdom
en_quotes.author: Confucius

en_quotes.quote: All human wisdom is summed up in two words; wait and hope
en_quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

en_quotes.quote: In wisdom gathered over time I have found that every experience is a form of exploration
en_quotes.author: Ansel Adams

en_quotes.quote: The invariable mark of wisdom is to see the miraculous in the common
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: The final wisdom of life requires not the annulment of incongruity but the achievement of serenity within and above it
en_quotes.author: Reinhold Niebuhr

en_quotes.quote: Start wide, expand further, and never look back
en_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

en_quotes.quote: The young man knows the rules, but the old man knows the exceptions
en_quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

en_quotes.quote: Beware, so long as you live, of judging men by their outward appearance
en_quotes.author: Jean de La Fontaine

en_quotes.quote: The opinion which other people have of you is their problem, not yours
en_quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

en_quotes.quote: If you want a thing done well, do it yourself
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge without justice ought to be called cunning rather than wisdom
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: Never interrupt someone doing what you said couldn't be done
en_quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

en_quotes.quote: Before we acquire great power we must acquire wisdom to use it well
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Honesty is the best policy
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: What wisdom can you find that is greater than kindness?
en_quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

en_quotes.quote: We don't receive wisdom; we must discover it for ourselves after a journey that no one can take for us or spare us
en_quotes.author: Marcel Proust

en_quotes.quote: My advice to you is not to inquire why or whither, but just enjoy your ice cream while it's on your plate
en_quotes.author: Thornton Wilder

en_quotes.quote: Of all the things which wisdom provides to make us entirely happy, much the greatest is the possession of friendship
en_quotes.author: Epicurus

en_quotes.quote: Singleness of purpose is one of the chief essentials for success in life, no matter what may be one's aim
en_quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

en_quotes.quote: To embrace the whole world in friendship is wisdom. This wisdom is not changeable like the flowers that bloom and fade
en_quotes.author: Thiruvalluvar

en_quotes.quote: Follow your instincts. That's where true wisdom manifests itself
en_quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom is the knowledge of good and evil, not the strength to choose between the two
en_quotes.author: John Cheever

en_quotes.quote: Better mad with the rest of the world than wise alone
en_quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

en_quotes.quote: Logic is the beginning of wisdom, not the end
en_quotes.author: Leonard Nimoy

en_quotes.quote: With pride, there are many curses. With humility, there come many blessings
en_quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson

en_quotes.quote: I'd rather regret the things I've done than regret the things I haven't done
en_quotes.author: Lucille Ball

en_quotes.quote: Your sacred space is where you can find yourself again and again
en_quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

en_quotes.quote: Ignorant men raise questions that wise men answered a thousand years ago
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: Nothing that you have not given away will ever be really yours
en_quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

en_quotes.quote: The virtue of justice consists in moderation, as regulated by wisdom
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: Don't taunt the alligator until after you've crossed the creek
en_quotes.author: Dan Rather

en_quotes.quote: To light one candle to God and another to the Devil is the principle of wisdom
en_quotes.author: Jose Bergamin

en_quotes.quote: Gray hairs are signs of wisdom if you hold your tongue, speak and they are but hairs, as in the young
en_quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

en_quotes.quote: If I am fool, it is, at least, a doubting one; and I envy no one the certainty of his self-approved wisdom
en_quotes.author: Lord Byron

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom is oftentimes nearer when we stoop than when we soar
en_quotes.author: William Wordsworth

en_quotes.quote: The wisdom of the wise, and the experience of ages, may be preserved by quotation
en_quotes.author: Isaac D'Israeli

en_quotes.quote: The motto of chivalry is also the motto of wisdom; to serve all, but love only one
en_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

en_quotes.quote: They whom truth and wisdom lead, can gather honey from a weed
en_quotes.author: William Cowper

en_quotes.quote: To wear your heart on your sleeve isn't a very good plan; you should wear it inside, where it functions best
en_quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

en_quotes.quote: Climb the mountains and get their good tidings
en_quotes.author: John Muir

en_quotes.quote: Kindness is wisdom
en_quotes.author: Philip James Bailey

en_quotes.quote: A heart well prepared for adversity in bad times hopes, and in good times fears for a change in fortune
en_quotes.author: Horace

en_quotes.quote: Once you label me you negate me
en_quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

en_quotes.quote: Avoid having your ego so close to your position that when your position falls, your ego goes with it
en_quotes.author: Colin Powell

en_quotes.quote: We need to hear stories from older women. There's a wealth of wisdom and real resilience there, but they're silenced
en_quotes.author: Hannah Gadsby

en_quotes.quote: You can observe a lot by watching
en_quotes.author: Yogi Berra

en_quotes.quote: If you were to offer a thirsty man all wisdom, you would not please him more than if you gave him a drink
en_quotes.author: Sophocles

en_quotes.quote: But life is long. And it is the long run that balances the short flare of interest and passion
en_quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom is always an overmatch for strength
en_quotes.author: Phil Jackson

en_quotes.quote: The extreme limit of wisdom, that's what the public calls madness
en_quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

en_quotes.quote: Today's mighty oak is just yesterday's nut, that held its ground
en_quotes.author: David Icke

en_quotes.quote: The art of storytelling is reaching its end because the epic side of truth, wisdom, is dying out
en_quotes.author: Walter Benjamin

en_quotes.quote: Always be a first-rate version of yourself, instead of a second-rate version of somebody else
en_quotes.author: Judy Garland

en_quotes.quote: Start with what is right rather than what is acceptable
en_quotes.author: Franz Kafka

en_quotes.quote: The hours of folly are measured by the clock; but of wisdom, no clock can measure
en_quotes.author: William Blake

en_quotes.quote: Pure, holy simplicity confounds all the wisdom of this world and the wisdom of the flesh
en_quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

en_quotes.quote: It's easier to resist at the beginning than at the end
en_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

en_quotes.quote: The time to repair the roof is when the sun is shining
en_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: There are three faithful friends - an old wife, an old dog, and ready money
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: The attempt to combine wisdom and power has only rarely been successful and then only for a short while
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: The truth is not for all men, but only for those who seek it
en_quotes.author: Ayn Rand

en_quotes.quote: There is more wisdom in your body than in your deepest philosophy
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: Sorrow is knowledge, those that know the most must mourn the deepest, the tree of knowledge is not the tree of life
en_quotes.author: Lord Byron

en_quotes.quote: Life is a travelling to the edge of knowledge, then a leap taken
en_quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

en_quotes.quote: If you set out to be liked, you would be prepared to compromise on anything at any time, and you would achieve nothing
en_quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

en_quotes.quote: Democracy is a pathetic belief in the collective wisdom of individual ignorance
en_quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

en_quotes.quote: Swim upstream. Go the other way. Ignore the conventional wisdom
en_quotes.author: Sam Walton

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge which is divorced from justice, may be called cunning rather than wisdom
en_quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

en_quotes.quote: To know how to grow old is the master work of wisdom, and one of the most difficult chapters in the great art of living
en_quotes.author: Herman Melville

en_quotes.quote: If you have the guts to keep making mistakes, your wisdom and intelligence leap forward with huge momentum
en_quotes.author: Holly Near

en_quotes.quote: Think big thoughts but relish small pleasures
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: To profit from good advice requires more wisdom than to give it
en_quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

en_quotes.quote: Dost thou love life? Then do not squander time, for that is the stuff life is made of
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: Every man is a damn fool for at least five minutes every day; wisdom consists in not exceeding the limit
en_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: The sum of wisdom is that time is never lost that is devoted to work
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: It is not wisdom but Authority that makes a law
en_quotes.author: Thomas Hobbes

en_quotes.quote: It requires wisdom to understand wisdom: the music is nothing if the audience is deaf
en_quotes.author: Walter Lippmann

en_quotes.quote: Music is a higher revelation than all wisdom and philosophy
en_quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom stands at the turn in the road and calls upon us publicly, but we consider it false and despise its adherents
en_quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: Earthly wisdom is doing what comes naturally. Godly wisdom is doing what the Holy Spirit compels us to do
en_quotes.author: Charles Stanley

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom consists of the anticipation of consequences
en_quotes.author: Norman Cousins

en_quotes.quote: It is the neglect of timely repair that makes rebuilding necessary
en_quotes.author: Richard Whately

en_quotes.quote: How many cares one loses when one decides not to be something but to be someone
en_quotes.author: Coco Chanel

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom alone is the science of other sciences
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: Commitment is an act, not a word
en_quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

en_quotes.quote: To conquer fear is the beginning of wisdom
en_quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

en_quotes.quote: Rich people without wisdom and learning are but sheep with golden fleeces
en_quotes.author: Solon

en_quotes.quote: The function of wisdom is to discriminate between good and evil
en_quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

en_quotes.quote: We cannot become what we need to be by remaining what we are
en_quotes.author: Max de Pree

en_quotes.quote: Mistakes are the usual bridge between inexperience and wisdom
en_quotes.author: Phyllis Theroux

en_quotes.quote: The art of being wise is the art of knowing what to overlook
en_quotes.author: William James

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom comes alone through suffering
en_quotes.author: Aeschylus

en_quotes.quote: Every silver lining has a cloud
en_quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

en_quotes.quote: Wise sayings often fall on barren ground, but a kind word is never thrown away
en_quotes.author: Arthur Helps

en_quotes.quote: Never accept ultimatums, conventional wisdom, or absolutes
en_quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

en_quotes.quote: The fall of dropping water wears away the Stone
en_quotes.author: Lucretius

en_quotes.quote: Since human wisdom cannot secure us from accidents, it is the greatest effort of reason to bear them well
en_quotes.author: John Paul Jones

en_quotes.quote: Genius unrefined resembles a flash of lightning, but wisdom is like the sun
en_quotes.author: Franz Grillparzer

en_quotes.quote: I know that inner wisdom is more precious than wealth. The more you spend it, the more you gain
en_quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

en_quotes.quote: If the world were perfect, it wouldn't be
en_quotes.author: Yogi Berra

en_quotes.quote: You need to have extraordinary wisdom to be the forerunner
en_quotes.author: Ma Huateng

en_quotes.quote: Kisses are a better fate than wisdom
en_quotes.author: e. e. cummings

en_quotes.quote: The clouds may drop down titles and estates, and wealth may seek us, but wisdom must be sought
en_quotes.author: Edward Young

en_quotes.quote: All wisdom does not reside in Delhi
en_quotes.author: P. Chidambaram

en_quotes.quote: Preconceived notions are the locks on the door to wisdom
en_quotes.author: Mary Browne

en_quotes.quote: It is the province of knowledge to speak, and it is the privilege of wisdom to listen
en_quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

en_quotes.quote: I'm married. My wife, Stella - a beautiful woman. She's brought a lot of peace to my life, a lot of wisdom
en_quotes.author: Anthony Hopkins

en_quotes.quote: Without courage, wisdom bears no fruit
en_quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

en_quotes.quote: Learning sleeps and snores in libraries, but wisdom is everywhere, wide awake, on tiptoe
en_quotes.author: Josh Billings

en_quotes.quote: If you call failures experiments, you can put them in your resume and claim them as achievements
en_quotes.author: Mason Cooley

en_quotes.quote: To win without risk is to triumph without glory
en_quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

en_quotes.quote: A fool flatters himself, a wise man flatters the fool
en_quotes.author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

en_quotes.quote: He who lives by the crystal ball soon learns to eat ground glass
en_quotes.author: Edgar Fiedler

en_quotes.quote: Data is not information, information is not knowledge, knowledge is not understanding, understanding is not wisdom
en_quotes.author: Clifford Stoll

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge is a process of piling up facts; wisdom lies in their simplification
en_quotes.author: Martin H. Fischer

en_quotes.quote: People seldom refuse help, if one offers it in the right way
en_quotes.author: A. C. Benson

en_quotes.quote: After all my possessions had been burned, God gave me the wisdom to return to Jerusalem
en_quotes.author: Shmuel Yosef Agnon

en_quotes.quote: If I don't have wisdom, I can teach you only ignorance
en_quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

en_quotes.quote: Tragedy is a tool for the living to gain wisdom, not a guide by which to live
en_quotes.author: Robert Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom cannot come by railroad or automobile or aeroplane, or be hurried up by telegraph or telephone
en_quotes.author: John Burroughs

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom comes from within. Knowledge is acquired and can sometimes put a screen on your wisdom
en_quotes.author: A. R. Rahman

en_quotes.quote: Public opinion is no more than this: what people think that other people think
en_quotes.author: Alfred Austin

en_quotes.quote: All of us, at certain moments of our lives, need to take advice and to receive help from other people
en_quotes.author: Alexis Carrel

en_quotes.quote: Applause is a receipt, not a bill
en_quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

en_quotes.quote: A monarchy conducted with infinite wisdom and infinite benevolence is the most perfect of all possible governments
en_quotes.author: Ezra Stiles

en_quotes.quote: The pine stays green in winter... wisdom in hardship
en_quotes.author: Norman Douglas

en_quotes.quote: Appearances are often deceiving
en_quotes.author: Aesop

en_quotes.quote: Who in their infinite wisdom decreed that Little League uniforms be white? Certainly not a mother
en_quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

en_quotes.quote: To keep your secret is wisdom; but to expect others to keep it is folly
en_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

en_quotes.quote: If fortune favors you do not be elated; if she frowns do not despond
en_quotes.author: Ausonius

en_quotes.quote: One part of wisdom is knowing what you don't need anymore and letting it go
en_quotes.author: Jane Fonda

en_quotes.quote: Cleverness is not wisdom
en_quotes.author: Euripides

en_quotes.quote: It is not from reason that justice springs, but goodness is born of wisdom
en_quotes.author: Maurice Maeterlinck

en_quotes.quote: Always keep an open mind and a compassionate heart
en_quotes.author: Phil Jackson

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom consists not so much in knowing what to do in the ultimate as knowing what to do next
en_quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

en_quotes.quote: For the Holy Ghost blesses us with optimism and wisdom at times of challenge that we simply cannot muster on our own
en_quotes.author: Sheri L. Dew

en_quotes.quote: In complete darkness, it is only knowledge and wisdom that separates us
en_quotes.author: Janet Jackson

en_quotes.quote: The weak have remedies, the wise have joys; superior wisdom is superior bliss
en_quotes.author: Edward Young

en_quotes.quote: A man should always consider how much he has more than he wants
en_quotes.author: Joseph Addison

en_quotes.quote: To know one's self is wisdom, but not to know one's neighbors is genius
en_quotes.author: Minna Antrim

en_quotes.quote: The doorstep to the temple of wisdom is a knowledge of our own ignorance
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: Our happiness depends on wisdom all the way
en_quotes.author: Sophocles

en_quotes.quote: We gain the strength of the temptation we resist
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Whatever you do in life, surround yourself with smart people who'll argue with you
en_quotes.author: John Wooden

en_quotes.quote: From the errors of others, a wise man corrects his own
en_quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

en_quotes.quote: It is a characteristic of wisdom not to do desperate things
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge comes, but wisdom lingers
en_quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

en_quotes.quote: All this worldly wisdom was once the unamiable heresy of some wise man
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: Who is wise in love, love most, say least
en_quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

en_quotes.quote: The doors of wisdom are never shut
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: In life, all good things come hard, but wisdom is the hardest to come by
en_quotes.author: Lucille Ball

en_quotes.quote: We are wiser than we know
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Does wisdom perhaps appear on the earth as a raven which is inspired by the smell of carrion?
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: Never does nature say one thing and wisdom another
en_quotes.author: Juvenal

en_quotes.quote: I didn't get where I am today by worryin' about how I'd feel tomorrow
en_quotes.author: Ron White

en_quotes.quote: I hope our wisdom will grow with our power, and teach us, that the less we use our power the greater it will be
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom has its root in goodness, not goodness its root in wisdom
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: There are three classes of men; lovers of wisdom, lovers of honor, and lovers of gain
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: Ignorance and bungling with love are better than wisdom and skill without
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: A little knowledge that acts is worth infinitely more than much knowledge that is idle
en_quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: Memory is the mother of all wisdom
en_quotes.author: Aeschylus

en_quotes.quote: Nine-tenths of wisdom is being wise in time
en_quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: A mistake is simply another way of doing things
en_quotes.author: Katharine Graham

en_quotes.quote: When you betray somebody else, you also betray yourself
en_quotes.author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

en_quotes.quote: Few people have the wisdom to prefer the criticism that would do them good, to the praise that deceives them
en_quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

en_quotes.quote: Cunning... is but the low mimic of wisdom
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: We never understand how little we need in this world until we know the loss of it
en_quotes.author: James M. Barrie

en_quotes.quote: Each of us finds his unique vehicle for sharing with others his bit of wisdom
en_quotes.author: Ram Dass

en_quotes.quote: If suffering brings wisdom, I would wish to be less wise
en_quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

en_quotes.quote: Nobody can give you wiser advice than yourself
en_quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

en_quotes.quote: A poem begins in delight and ends in wisdom
en_quotes.author: Robert Frost

en_quotes.quote: Our character is what we do when we think no one is looking
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Champions invariably have fervent philosophical beliefs. Philosophy, in its simplest terms, means 'the love of wisdom.'
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom I know is social. She seeks her fellows. But Beauty is jealous, and illy bears the presence of a rival
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: It is good even for old men to learn wisdom
en_quotes.author: Aeschylus

en_quotes.quote: When you give yourself, you receive more than you give
en_quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

en_quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it
en_quotes.author: Alan Kay

en_quotes.quote: It doesn't matter how much wisdom you have. If you don't have position, you have nothing. That's the tragedy of India
en_quotes.author: Rahul Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Use what talents you possess; the woods would be very silent if no birds sang there except those that sang best
en_quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

en_quotes.quote: The lure of the distant and the difficult is deceptive. The great opportunity is where you are
en_quotes.author: John Burroughs

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom is the power to put our time and our knowledge to the proper use
en_quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

en_quotes.quote: Our deeds determine us, as much as we determine our deeds
en_quotes.author: George Eliot

en_quotes.quote: The higher we are placed, the more humbly we should walk
en_quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

en_quotes.quote: Many sophisticated, intelligent people lack wisdom and common sense
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: Man's wisdom is his best friend; folly his worst enemy
en_quotes.author: William Temple

en_quotes.quote: Both in thought and in feeling, even though time be real, to realise the unimportance of time is the gate of wisdom
en_quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

en_quotes.quote: This is the highest wisdom that I own; freedom and life are earned by those alone who conquer them each day anew
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: Strength and wisdom are not opposing values
en_quotes.author: William J. Clinton

en_quotes.quote: The wheel that squeaks the loudest is the one that gets the grease
en_quotes.author: Josh Billings

en_quotes.quote: When a thing is done, it's done. Don't look back. Look forward to your next objective
en_quotes.author: George C. Marshall

en_quotes.quote: Slow and steady wins the race
en_quotes.author: Robert Lloyd

en_quotes.quote: It is the nature of the wise to resist pleasures, but the foolish to be a slave to them
en_quotes.author: Epictetus

en_quotes.quote: A closed mouth catches no flies
en_quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

en_quotes.quote: It is impossible to love and to be wise
en_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: It isn't what you do, but how you do it
en_quotes.author: John Wooden

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom is found only in truth
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom has never made a bigot, but learning has
en_quotes.author: Josh Billings

en_quotes.quote: Strong characters are brought out by change of situation, and gentle ones by permanence
en_quotes.author: Jean Paul

en_quotes.quote: Between saying and doing, many a pair of shoes is worn out
en_quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

en_quotes.quote: Vanity can easily overtake wisdom. It usually overtakes common sense
en_quotes.author: Julian Casablancas

en_quotes.quote: Be happy. It's one way of being wise
en_quotes.author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom sails with wind and time
en_quotes.author: John Florio

en_quotes.quote: A proverb is the wisdom of many and the wit of one
en_quotes.author: Lord John Russell

en_quotes.quote: Plodding wins the race
en_quotes.author: Aesop

en_quotes.quote: Please all, and you will please none
en_quotes.author: Aesop

en_quotes.quote: Irony is the gaiety of reflection and the joy of wisdom
en_quotes.author: Anatole France

en_quotes.quote: Love is the wisdom of the fool and the folly of the wise
en_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

en_quotes.quote: A ruffled mind makes a restless pillow
en_quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

en_quotes.quote: Back of every mistaken venture and defeat is the laughter of wisdom, if you listen
en_quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge is proud that it knows so much; wisdom is humble that it knows no more
en_quotes.author: William Cowper

en_quotes.quote: The superior man blames himself. The inferior man blames others
en_quotes.author: Don Shula

en_quotes.quote: Set your course by the stars, not by the lights of every passing ship
en_quotes.author: Omar N. Bradley

en_quotes.quote: If we continue to develop our technology without wisdom or prudence, our servant may prove to be our executioner
en_quotes.author: Omar N. Bradley

en_quotes.quote: The road of excess leads to the palace of wisdom
en_quotes.author: William Blake

en_quotes.quote: There is a wisdom of the head, and a wisdom of the heart
en_quotes.author: Charles Dickens

en_quotes.quote: A loving heart is the truest wisdom
en_quotes.author: Charles Dickens

en_quotes.quote: We can be knowledgable with other men's knowledge but we cannot be wise with other men's wisdom
en_quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

en_quotes.quote: Great wisdom is generous; petty wisdom is contentious. Great speech is impassioned, small speech cantankerous
en_quotes.author: Zhuangzi

en_quotes.quote: I don't have the strength or wisdom to get through a single day without guidance and grace from God
en_quotes.author: Tony Dungy

en_quotes.quote: Fear cannot be without hope nor hope without fear
en_quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

en_quotes.quote: Everything in the world may be endured except continual prosperity
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: Habit is the nursery of errors
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: Tis but a part we see, and not a whole
en_quotes.author: Alexander Pope

en_quotes.quote: Mixing one's wines may be a mistake, but old and new wisdom mix admirably
en_quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

en_quotes.quote: A man begins cutting his wisdom teeth the first time he bites off more than he can chew
en_quotes.author: Herb Caen

en_quotes.quote: If you want to go east, don't go west
en_quotes.author: Ramakrishna

en_quotes.quote: Rightly defined philosophy is simply the love of wisdom
en_quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

en_quotes.quote: A mouse does not rely on just one hole
en_quotes.author: Plautus

en_quotes.quote: True wisdom listens more, talks less and can get along with all types of people
en_quotes.author: Kiana Tom

en_quotes.quote: You always have two choices: your commitment versus your fear
en_quotes.author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Music is your own experience, your own thoughts, your wisdom
en_quotes.author: Charlie Parker

en_quotes.quote: Doubt is the vestibule through which all must pass before they can enter into the temple of wisdom
en_quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

en_quotes.quote: There is no wisdom of man that can change men or change nations; it is the power and wisdom of God that can
en_quotes.author: Yemi Osinbajo

en_quotes.quote: Seek the lofty by reading, hearing and seeing great work at some moment every day
en_quotes.author: Thornton Wilder

en_quotes.quote: The greater the step forward in knowledge, the greater is the one taken backward in search of wisdom
en_quotes.author: Stephen Gardiner

en_quotes.quote: I consider wisdom supernatural because it isn't taught by men - it's a gift from God
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: Purity engenders Wisdom, Passion avarice, and Ignorance folly, infatuation and darkness
en_quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

en_quotes.quote: Once I turned 35, I got the bonus of some wisdom and began to accept life on its own terms
en_quotes.author: Mike Myers

en_quotes.quote: If you want to be found stand where the seeker seeks
en_quotes.author: Sidney Lanier

en_quotes.quote: What happens is not as important as how you react to what happens
en_quotes.author: Ellen Glasgow

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom is knowing what to do next; virtue is doing it
en_quotes.author: David Starr Jordan

en_quotes.quote: Pain is the doorway to wisdom and to truth
en_quotes.author: Keith Miller

en_quotes.quote: No one wants advice - only corroboration
en_quotes.author: John Steinbeck

en_quotes.quote: Magnanimity in politics is not seldom the truest wisdom; and a great empire and little minds go ill together
en_quotes.author: Edmund Burke

en_quotes.quote: A prudent question is one-half of wisdom
en_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: Holy wisdom confounds Satan and all his wickednesses
en_quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

en_quotes.quote: Trouble shared is trouble halved
en_quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

en_quotes.quote: Man is only great when he acts from passion
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: The wisdom of the wise and the experience of the ages are perpetuated by quotations
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: Though sages may pour out their wisdom's treasure, there is no sterner moralist than pleasure
en_quotes.author: Lord Byron

en_quotes.quote: Silence is true wisdom's best reply
en_quotes.author: Euripides

en_quotes.quote: It is like the seed put in the soil - the more one sows, the greater the harvest
en_quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

en_quotes.quote: The truest greatness lies in being kind, the truest wisdom in a happy mind
en_quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

en_quotes.quote: Of prosperity mortals can never have enough
en_quotes.author: Aeschylus

en_quotes.quote: One of the greatest pieces of economic wisdom is to know what you do not know
en_quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

en_quotes.quote: The soul's joy lies in doing
en_quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

en_quotes.quote: You must accept responsibility for your actions, but not the credit for your achievements
en_quotes.author: Denis Waitley

en_quotes.quote: Science is always discovering odd scraps of magical wisdom and making a tremendous fuss about its cleverness
en_quotes.author: Aleister Crowley

en_quotes.quote: All free governments are managed by the combined wisdom and folly of the people
en_quotes.author: James A. Garfield

en_quotes.quote: Not engaging in ignorance is wisdom
en_quotes.author: Bodhidharma

en_quotes.quote: Young people, you need the wisdom of age, just as some of us older ones need your enthusiasm for life
en_quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson

en_quotes.quote: Thinking is not enough. There is no final enough of wisdom, experience - any... thing
en_quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

en_quotes.quote: I gave my beauty and my youth to men. I am going to give my wisdom and experience to animals
en_quotes.author: Brigitte Bardot

en_quotes.quote: When an opponent comes forward, move in and greet him; if he wants to pull back, send him on his way
en_quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

en_quotes.quote: It is not who is right, but what is right, that is of importance
en_quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom and knowledge are the most valuable things in the body
en_quotes.author: Masayoshi Son

en_quotes.quote: The more one pleases everybody, the less one pleases profoundly
en_quotes.author: Stendhal

en_quotes.quote: Repeat anything often enough and it will start to become you
en_quotes.author: Tom Hopkins

en_quotes.quote: We do not sit as a superlegislature to weigh the wisdom of legislation
en_quotes.author: William O. Douglas

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom is a kind of knowledge. It is knowledge of the nature, career, and consequences of human values
en_quotes.author: Sidney Hook

en_quotes.quote: Perspective is worth 80 IQ points
en_quotes.author: Alan Kay

en_quotes.quote: The future has already arrived. It's just not evenly distributed yet
en_quotes.author: William Gibson

en_quotes.quote: Even youngish men can acquire wisdom as time goes by
en_quotes.author: John Bercow

en_quotes.quote: Good nature is worth more than knowledge, more than money, more than honor, to the persons who possess it
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: My mother is a great source of advice and wisdom and consolation for me
en_quotes.author: Katherine Heigl

en_quotes.quote: Experiences are savings which a miser puts aside. Wisdom is an inheritance which a wastrel cannot exhaust
en_quotes.author: Karl Kraus

en_quotes.quote: Counsel woven into the fabric of real life is wisdom
en_quotes.author: Walter Benjamin

en_quotes.quote: Deliberately seek opportunities for kindness, sympathy, and patience
en_quotes.author: Evelyn Underhill

en_quotes.quote: Above all, you must fight conceit, envy, and every kind of ill-feeling in your heart
en_quotes.author: Abraham Cahan

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom we know is the knowledge of good and evil, not the strength to choose between the two
en_quotes.author: John Cheever

en_quotes.quote: I do not believe in the collective wisdom of individual ignorance
en_quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

en_quotes.quote: Quick decisions are unsafe decisions
en_quotes.author: Sophocles

en_quotes.quote: Much wisdom often goes with fewest words
en_quotes.author: Sophocles

en_quotes.quote: Self-suggestion makes you master of yourself
en_quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom is that apprehension of heavenly things to which the spirit rises through love
en_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

en_quotes.quote: It is the mind that maketh good or ill, That maketh wretch or happy, rich or poor
en_quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

en_quotes.quote: I'm now the elder in the position of doling out wisdom and trying to mend fences
en_quotes.author: Jane Fonda

en_quotes.quote: Along with success comes a reputation for wisdom
en_quotes.author: Euripides

en_quotes.quote: Surely wisdom will come as we listen to learn from children, parents, partners, neighbors, Church leaders, and the Lord
en_quotes.author: Russell M. Nelson

en_quotes.quote: That which seems the height of absurdity in one generation often becomes the height of wisdom in another
en_quotes.author: Adlai Stevenson I

en_quotes.quote: Science gives us knowledge, but only philosophy can give us wisdom
en_quotes.author: Will Durant

en_quotes.quote: An ounce of cheerfulness is worth a pound of sadness to serve God with
en_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

en_quotes.quote: The wisdom of man never yet contrived a system of taxation that would operate with perfect equality
en_quotes.author: Andrew Jackson

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom is a sacred communion
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: It is wisdom in prosperity, when all is as thou wouldn't have it, to fear and suspect the worst
en_quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

en_quotes.quote: Look twice before you leap
en_quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

en_quotes.quote: It's not the having, it's the getting
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

en_quotes.quote: Now that I am sixty, I see why the idea of elder wisdom has passed from currency
en_quotes.author: John Updike

en_quotes.quote: Putting is like wisdom - partly a natural gift and partly the accumulation of experience
en_quotes.author: Arnold Palmer

en_quotes.quote: If you do not express your own original ideas, if you do not listen to your own being, you will have betrayed yourself
en_quotes.author: Rollo May

en_quotes.quote: More helpful than all wisdom is one draught of simple human pity that will not forsake us
en_quotes.author: George Eliot

en_quotes.quote: In the vain laughter of folly wisdom hears half its applause
en_quotes.author: George Eliot

en_quotes.quote: For all my education, accomplishments, and so called 'wisdom'... I can't fathom my own heart
en_quotes.author: Michael Caine

en_quotes.quote: The wisdom of age: don't stop walking
en_quotes.author: Mason Cooley

en_quotes.quote: At sixty, I know little more about wisdom than I did at thirty, but I know a great deal more about folly
en_quotes.author: Mason Cooley

en_quotes.quote: The more you meditate on the laws of Moses, the more striking and brighter does their wisdom appear
en_quotes.author: John Quincy Adams

en_quotes.quote: I think I got a lot of life skills; I got a lot of wisdom; I've seen a lot of bad things happen to a lot of good people
en_quotes.author: Young Jeezy

en_quotes.quote: In the frank expression of conflicting opinions lies the greatest promise of wisdom in governmental action
en_quotes.author: Louis D. Brandeis

en_quotes.quote: Sciences may be learned by rote, but wisdom not
en_quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

en_quotes.quote: If you wish to reach the highest, begin at the lowest
en_quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

en_quotes.quote: I'm not a mom, but I think the word 'mother' is about wisdom
en_quotes.author: Margaret Cho

en_quotes.quote: I'm a member of the 1960s generation. We didn't have any wisdom
en_quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom is not attained by years, but by ability
en_quotes.author: Plautus

en_quotes.quote: A great memory is never made synonymous with wisdom, any more than a dictionary would be called a treatise
en_quotes.author: John Henry Newman

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge shrinks as wisdom grows
en_quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

en_quotes.quote: I praise loudly. I blame softly
en_quotes.author: Catherine the Great

en_quotes.quote: When defeat is inevitable, it is wisest to yield
en_quotes.author: Quintilian

en_quotes.quote: I've always shied away from conventional wisdom, though I know the power of it
en_quotes.author: Peter Jennings

en_quotes.quote: I'm not wise, but the beginning of wisdom is there; it's like relaxing into - and an acceptance of - things
en_quotes.author: Tina Turner

en_quotes.quote: I haven't any wisdom - just a child like everybody else. I'm not as great as Frank Lloyd Wright
en_quotes.author: Philip Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Never reach out your hand unless you're willing to extend an arm
en_quotes.author: Pope Paul VI

en_quotes.quote: The greatest wisdom is to realize one's lack of it
en_quotes.author: Constantin Stanislavski

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom begins at the end
en_quotes.author: Daniel Webster

en_quotes.quote: Let me warn you, if you start chasing after views, you'll be left without bread and without views
en_quotes.author: Nikolai Gogol

en_quotes.quote: There's a real wisdom to not saying a thing
en_quotes.author: Willem Dafoe

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom lies neither in fixity nor in change, but in the dialectic between the two
en_quotes.author: Octavio Paz

en_quotes.quote: With age comes a greater wisdom, an ease and comfort with oneself
en_quotes.author: Cherie Lunghi

en_quotes.quote: Mainstream media tend to just mouth the conventional wisdom, to see everything through the filter of right and left
en_quotes.author: Arianna Huffington

en_quotes.quote: Year's end is neither an end nor a beginning but a going on, with all the wisdom that experience can instill in us
en_quotes.author: Hal Borland

en_quotes.quote: Though I am fascinated by knowledge, I am even more fascinated by wisdom
en_quotes.author: Abraham Verghese

en_quotes.quote: Keep well; that is the half of wisdom and of happiness
en_quotes.author: Emile Zola

en_quotes.quote: Perhaps too much of everything is as bad as too little
en_quotes.author: Edna Ferber

en_quotes.quote: It takes a great man to give sound advice tactfully, but a greater to accept it graciously
en_quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

en_quotes.quote: What is man's ultimate direction in life? It is to look for love, truth, virtue, and beauty
en_quotes.author: Shinichi Suzuki

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom is keeping a sense of fallibility of all our views and opinions
en_quotes.author: Gerald Brenan

en_quotes.quote: I'll come to you with gifts of knowledge, wisdom and truth
en_quotes.author: Barry White

en_quotes.quote: It is astonishing with how little wisdom mankind can be governed, when that little wisdom is its own
en_quotes.author: William Inge

en_quotes.quote: In your 20s you can be pretty, but you don't accomplish real beauty until you find wisdom and depth
en_quotes.author: Evangeline Lilly

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom doesn't necessarily come with age. Sometimes age just shows up all by itself
en_quotes.author: Tom Wilson

en_quotes.quote: Lord, give us the wisdom to utter words that are gentle and tender, for tomorrow we may have to eat them
en_quotes.author: Mo Udall

en_quotes.quote: Doubt the conventional wisdom unless you can verify it with reason and experiment
en_quotes.author: Steve Albini

en_quotes.quote: Beauty, the eternal Spouse of the Wisdom of God and Angel of his Presence thru' all creation
en_quotes.author: Robert Bridges

en_quotes.quote: Some folks are wise and some are otherwise
en_quotes.author: Tobias Smollett

en_quotes.quote: Better than the strength of men and horses is our wisdom
en_quotes.author: Xenophanes

en_quotes.quote: If people can't acknowledge the wisdom of indigenous cultures, then that's their loss
en_quotes.author: Jay Griffiths

en_quotes.quote: All human wisdom works and has worries and grief as reward
en_quotes.author: Johann Georg Hamann

en_quotes.quote: Contemplation and wisdom are highest achievements and man is not totally at home with them
en_quotes.author: Gabriel Marcel

en_quotes.quote: My dad was a man of great wisdom in his short time here
en_quotes.author: Bonnie Hunt

en_quotes.quote: I have studied many philosophers and many cats. The wisdom of cats is infinitely superior
en_quotes.author: Hippolyte Taine

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom is the abstract of the past, but beauty is the promise of the future
en_quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

en_quotes.quote: When you doubt, abstain
en_quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

en_quotes.quote: Almost every wise saying has an opposite one, no less wise, to balance it
en_quotes.author: George Santayana

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom comes by disillusionment
en_quotes.author: George Santayana

en_quotes.quote: The hunger for facile wisdom is the root of all false philosophy
en_quotes.author: George Santayana

en_quotes.quote: Knowing that you are going to die is, I suspect, the beginning of wisdom
en_quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom outweighs any wealth
en_quotes.author: Sophocles

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom is the supreme part of happiness
en_quotes.author: Sophocles

en_quotes.quote: A short saying often contains much wisdom
en_quotes.author: Sophocles

en_quotes.quote: I prefer the folly of enthusiasm to the indifference of wisdom
en_quotes.author: Anatole France

en_quotes.quote: It is great folly to wish to be wise all alone
en_quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

en_quotes.quote: We give advice, but we cannot give the wisdom to profit by it
en_quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

en_quotes.quote: However glorious an action in itself, it ought not to pass for great if it be not the effect of wisdom and intention
en_quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

en_quotes.quote: The most certain sign of wisdom is cheerfulness
en_quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

en_quotes.quote: In my definition of consciousness, consciousness is the same thing as life. What wisdom traditions also call spirit
en_quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

en_quotes.quote: Some wisdom you must learn from one who's wise
en_quotes.author: Euripides

en_quotes.quote: Look around for a place to sow a few seeds
en_quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom is not wisdom when it is derived from books alone
en_quotes.author: Horace

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom is knowledge which has become a part of one's being
en_quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

en_quotes.quote: Common sense in an uncommon degree is what the world calls wisdom
en_quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

en_quotes.quote: The enemy of the conventional wisdom is not ideas but the march of events
en_quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

en_quotes.quote: Rarely promise, but, if lawful, constantly perform
en_quotes.author: William Penn

en_quotes.quote: First appearance deceives many
en_quotes.author: Ovid

en_quotes.quote: Few of the many wise apothegms which have been uttered have prevented a single foolish action
en_quotes.author: Thomas Babington Macaulay

en_quotes.quote: I always want to be a messenger, a person that, you know, that's not afraid to pass on wisdom
en_quotes.author: Mary J. Blige

en_quotes.quote: Full of wisdom are the ordinations of fate
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

en_quotes.quote: They would need to be already wise, in order to love wisdom
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom is humble that he knows no more
en_quotes.author: William Cowper

en_quotes.quote: In seeking wisdom thou art wise; in imagining that thou hast attained it - thou art a fool
en_quotes.author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

en_quotes.quote: In youth and beauty, wisdom is but rare!
en_quotes.author: Homer

en_quotes.quote: Our own physical body possesses a wisdom which we who inhabit the body lack. We give it orders which make no sense
en_quotes.author: Henry Miller

en_quotes.quote: The seat of knowledge is in the head; of wisdom, in the heart. We are sure to judge wrong, if we do not feel right
en_quotes.author: William Hazlitt

en_quotes.quote: To think ill of mankind and not wish ill to them, is perhaps the highest wisdom and virtue
en_quotes.author: William Hazlitt

en_quotes.quote: We must learn from the sermons of Christ, the wisdom of Laotzu, the teachings of Buddha
en_quotes.author: Charles Lindbergh

en_quotes.quote: Enraging liberals is simply one of the more enjoyable side effects of my wisdom
en_quotes.author: Rush Limbaugh

en_quotes.quote: I reject most conventional wisdom
en_quotes.author: Rush Limbaugh

en_quotes.quote: Blessed are they who seek to learn wisdom
en_quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson

en_quotes.quote: Economists often like startling theorems, results which seem to run counter to conventional wisdom
en_quotes.author: Joseph Stiglitz

en_quotes.quote: Men who know themselves are no longer fools. They stand on the threshold of the door of Wisdom
en_quotes.author: Havelock Ellis

en_quotes.quote: Let deeds match words
en_quotes.author: Plautus

en_quotes.quote: Not by age but by capacity is wisdom acquired
en_quotes.author: Plautus

en_quotes.quote: Let us act on what we have, since we have not what we wish
en_quotes.author: John Henry Newman

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom is the quality that keeps you from getting into situations where you need it
en_quotes.author: Doug Larson

en_quotes.quote: Never cut what you can untie
en_quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

en_quotes.quote: With age comes wisdom
en_quotes.author: S. Sreesanth

en_quotes.quote: It is plain to me that our prelates, in granting indulgences, do commonly blaspheme the wisdom of God
en_quotes.author: John Wycliffe

en_quotes.quote: The difference between chirping out of turn and a faux pas depends on what kind of a bar you're in
en_quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

en_quotes.quote: We all admire the wisdom of people who come to us for advice
en_quotes.author: Arthur Helps

en_quotes.quote: It's very hard to know what wisdom is
en_quotes.author: James Hillman

en_quotes.quote: Suffering is one of life's great teachers
en_quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

en_quotes.quote: If an idea is indeed sensible, it will eventually become just part of the accepted wisdom
en_quotes.author: Nigel Farage

en_quotes.quote: It is not white hair that engenders wisdom
en_quotes.author: Menander

en_quotes.quote: Discipline is wisdom and vice versa
en_quotes.author: M. Scott Peck

en_quotes.quote: There's a beauty to wisdom and experience that cannot be faked. It's impossible to be mature without having lived
en_quotes.author: Amy Grant

en_quotes.quote: A man may learn wisdom even from a foe
en_quotes.author: Aristophanes

en_quotes.quote: Moderation is the inseparable companion of wisdom, but with it genius has not even a nodding acquaintance
en_quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

en_quotes.quote: There is often, in the affairs of government, more efficiency and wisdom in non-action than in action
en_quotes.author: John C. Calhoun

en_quotes.quote: A promise made is a debt unpaid
en_quotes.author: Robert W. Service

en_quotes.quote: The thing that we possess, that machines don't, is the ability to exhibit wisdom
en_quotes.author: Herbie Hancock

en_quotes.quote: Without wisdom, the future has no meaning, no valuable purpose
en_quotes.author: Herbie Hancock

en_quotes.quote: You can practice to attain knowledge, but you can't practice to attain wisdom
en_quotes.author: Herbie Hancock

en_quotes.quote: To build a great company, which is a CEO's job, sometimes you have to stand up against conventional wisdom
en_quotes.author: Carly Fiorina

en_quotes.quote: Many of us spend half of our time wishing for things we could have if we didn't spend half our time wishing
en_quotes.author: Alexander Woollcott

en_quotes.quote: I used to think I was going to die wise, and now, the one wisdom I have is I know very little
en_quotes.author: Mary Steenburgen

en_quotes.quote: I associate wisdom and grace with age
en_quotes.author: Christy Turlington

en_quotes.quote: We all have within us a deep wisdom, but sometimes we don't know we have it
en_quotes.author: Shakti Gawain

en_quotes.quote: Conventional wisdom is not always the best wisdom
en_quotes.author: Doug Ducey

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom too often never comes, and so one ought not to reject it merely because it comes late
en_quotes.author: Felix Frankfurter

en_quotes.quote: The sweetest of all sounds is praise
en_quotes.author: Xenophon

en_quotes.quote: It is always our own self that we find at the end of the journey. The sooner we face that self, the better
en_quotes.author: Ella Maillart

en_quotes.quote: It is much more difficult to measure nonperformance than performance
en_quotes.author: Harold S. Geneen

en_quotes.quote: As we work to reweave the strands of connection, we can be supported by the wisdom and lovingkindness of others
en_quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

en_quotes.quote: Even wisdom has to yield to self-interest
en_quotes.author: Pindar

en_quotes.quote: Outside of hip-hop, it was in comics that I most often found the aesthetics and wisdom of my world reflected
en_quotes.author: Ta-Nehisi Coates

en_quotes.quote: I think with experience and age, you gain knowledge and wisdom
en_quotes.author: Nick Foles

en_quotes.quote: It used to be, it is accepted scientific wisdom the Earth is flat, and this heretic named Galileo was branded a denier
en_quotes.author: Ted Cruz

en_quotes.quote: I am thinking of taking a fifth wife. Why not? Solomon had a thousand wives and he is a synonym for wisdom
en_quotes.author: John Barrymore

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom may best arise from a humbling reality
en_quotes.author: Michael Leunig

en_quotes.quote: It is astonishing what force, purity, and wisdom it requires for a human being to keep clear of falsehoods
en_quotes.author: Margaret Fuller

en_quotes.quote: It is better to rust out than wear out
en_quotes.author: Edwin Markham

en_quotes.quote: Virtues are acquired through endeavor, which rests wholly upon yourself
en_quotes.author: Sidney Lanier

en_quotes.quote: The wisdom of the wise is an uncommon degree of common sense
en_quotes.author: William Inge

en_quotes.quote: Combine the extremes, and you will have the true center
en_quotes.author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

en_quotes.quote: The conventional wisdom is that if you are gay, you cannot play the romantic straight lead in a movie
en_quotes.author: Ian Mckellen

en_quotes.quote: Giving opens the way for receiving
en_quotes.author: Florence Scovel Shinn

en_quotes.quote: Some coaches pray for wisdom. I pray for 260-pound tackles. They'll give me plenty of wisdom
en_quotes.author: Chuck Noll

en_quotes.quote: It isn't right to judge strength as better than good wisdom
en_quotes.author: Xenophanes

en_quotes.quote: The less you talk, the more you're listened to
en_quotes.author: Pauline Phillips

en_quotes.quote: You have to know when to stop - that's wisdom
en_quotes.author: Hubert de Givenchy

en_quotes.quote: He who devotes sixteen hours a day to hard study may become at sixty as wise as he thought himself at twenty
en_quotes.author: Mary Wilson Little

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge is marvelous, but wisdom is even better
en_quotes.author: Kay Redfield Jamison

en_quotes.quote: He was gifted with the sly, sharp instinct for self-preservation that passes for wisdom among the rich
en_quotes.author: Evelyn Waugh

en_quotes.quote: We thought, because we had power, we had wisdom
en_quotes.author: Stephen Vincent Benet

en_quotes.quote: Our wisdom comes from our experience, and our experience comes from our foolishness
en_quotes.author: Sacha Guitry

en_quotes.quote: This fear of the Lord is indeed the beginning of wisdom. This consciousness of sin is the straight pathway to heaven
en_quotes.author: Joseph Barber Lightfoot

en_quotes.quote: To keep your secret is wisdom; to expect others to keep it is folly
en_quotes.author: William Samuel Johnson

en_quotes.quote: It is costly wisdom that is bought by experience
en_quotes.author: Roger Ascham

en_quotes.quote: Meditation is the soul's perspective glass
en_quotes.author: Owen Feltham

en_quotes.quote: Everything important always begins from something trivial
en_quotes.author: Donald Hall

en_quotes.quote: You can't sweep other people off their feet, if you can't be swept off your own
en_quotes.author: Clarence Day

en_quotes.quote: This is what I learned: that everybody is talented, original and has something important to say
en_quotes.author: Brenda Ueland

en_quotes.quote: He dares to be a fool, and that is the first step in the direction of wisdom
en_quotes.author: James Huneker
